ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] Armor choices, what is best?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Also, there s a good 1H in sky, the Blade of Abrogation.  It is basically a 2H weapon in one hand.  Looks like the Dark Reaver and is 20/39. As for
ygData.messageBody:
Chip Paul wrote:
>
> From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>
>
> "(Lasombra Shadowfiend)" wrote:
> >
> > From: "(Lasombra Shadowfiend)" <vtemplarv@...>
> >
> > What about the Planes 1HS weapons? Also, as a DE, I will lose bash unless I
> > have a shield, not to mention alot of AC.
> >


Also, there's a good 1H in sky, the Blade of Abrogation. It is
basically
a 2H weapon in one hand. Looks like the Dark Reaver and is 20/39.

As for shields, anything goes until you get a Bladestopper or Ashenbone
shield, found off dragons and plane mobs, respectively. I'm using
a bark shield, but the resistances on a MM shield is tempting, as is
the +9 str from the darkwood shield if you are close to your
encumberance limit all the time (my str sucks)

Xilith
